name: Nico Limbara
about_me: Web Developer with over 2 years experience, i put on my 100% effort into what i do and work hard to gain what i want. I'm currently still learing on to improve in web development.

experiences.description: Me and my friend was working to move dealjava' API from CI to Laravel Lumen in the early days and fixing bugs. Now we are working on a new Project called DIYO.

I worked on dealjava.com desktop and mobile interface. when i first came to work here, i had the chance to build the website from scratch because dealjava had a new design. The desktop and mobile site was built with Vue on a different codebase. Also work on features and fix bugs.
